https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f41lfuAx7RvThgQRA7ZlLIbg73D.jpg When three women with no previous acquaintance kill a male shopkeeper in the middle of the day, the female psychiatrist assigned to the case sets out to understand why. A Question of Silence
